values: 水龙头；龙头；阀门；旋塞；螺纹刀具；螺丝攻；窃听装置；电话窃听；轻拍音；轻触；轻敲；轻拍；提取；开发；利用
轻拍；轻敲；轻击；在…上攻螺纹；给…装上丝锥；挑选；指定；委任；选择；利用；开发；发掘（资源、知识等）；（在电话上）安装窃听器；搭线窃听；<英，非正式>非法劝说（运动员）转会

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 抽头的；分接的；发接触音的
[冶] 出钢；开孔；出渣；轻敲声

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用手轻拍以示同情、赞同或爱抚。
指用拳头或其它器械猛敲或猛打；也指用手轻敲某物。
指用手指或木棒等快速地轻敲或急拍。
多指慢慢地连续地轻击或轻拍。

word_group.brief_definition: 随时可以旋开旋塞供饮用；可随时使用的；按计划发生的
弯嘴旋塞；弯嘴龙头；排放旋塞
自来水；饮用自来水；水龙头水

bilingual.source: Turn on the tap so that the ‘toothpaste water' is rinsed away.
bilingual.target: 打开水龙头冲掉“牙膏水”。

bilingual.source: When you use a tap, make sure you turn it off properly.
bilingual.target: 使用水龙头时，确保你正确关闭它。

bilingual.source: If you run a tap, then make sure you turn it off afterwards.
bilingual.target: 如果你打开水龙头，确保之后关掉它。

bilingual.source: Next, the tea concentrate is poured into cups, after which water from inside the samovar is added by using the tap.
bilingual.target: 接下来，将浓茶倒入杯中，然后用水龙头加入茶炊内的水。
我们需要一个新的水龙头。
你能修理这个水龙头吗？

bilingual.source: Please remember to turn off the tap.

list.abstract: tap，音标[tæp]，英语单词。作名词为阀门；螺丝攻；酒吧等。作动词为旋开…放出液体；指定；倒出等。例句：She was brushing her teeth and the tap was on.（她正在刷牙，水龙头开着。） tap的近义词为percuss，pat，water faucet等。

Tap（Tap. cn）是一个新型的免费自助建站服务平台，它可以创建并管理包括网站在内的各种网络应用，轻松摆脱建站过程中技术对创造力的制约，其拥有极高自由度的Tap能够快速提升建站者的建站热情。Tap为不同用户的需求配备了完美的个性化解决方案，始终致力于将网站建设这一互联网核心应用普及大众，力求以更专业、更贴近不同用户建站需求为目标，全方位的为各类用户建站提供便捷建站的解决方案 。Tap的方向是建站技术平民化，用户体验自由化，服务平台开放化。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it is very good. Excellent tap. Excuse me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常棒。完美的自来水。不好意思。

yingyinNormal.en: Please enjoy my ecosystem of love. Never tap on the glass!
yingyinNormal.zh: 请享受我爱的生态，永远不许敲鱼缸！

yingyinNormal.en: I will miss you, Tony. Yeah? Well, it's time for me to tap out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会想你的，托尼。是吗？我也该休息一下了。

yingyinNormal.en: But the people you want to really tap is the hot person, it's not the cold person.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你真正想要告诫的是处于兴奋状态的人，而不是那些处于平静状态的人。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing? All right, great. Great. Thanks a lot. I'm going to tap class.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在干什么？太好了，谢谢太棒了，非常感谢，我要去上踢踏舞课。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me? Where's my boy? Seal the deal. Tap that ass. Money marries bigger money?
yingyinNormal.zh: 打扰一下，我的兄弟在哪了？不谈生意，拍拍马屁，钱滚钱？

yingyinNormal.en: A good way to check it's ready, give it a little tap and listen out for a hollow sound.
yingyinNormal.zh: 检测是否做好的一个方法是，敲几下听听，里面空空的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, what else? Well, there was acting classes, stage combat classes, tap classes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，还有呢？还有表演课，舞台打斗课，踢踏舞课。

yingyinNormal.en: First, we fill the buckets with sand. We turn the buckets over and give them a little tap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先要在水桶里装满沙子。然后我们把水桶倒过来 接着再轻轻拍一拍。

yingyinNormal.en: First, we put sand in the buckets. Like this. We turn the buckets upside down and tap them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，把沙子装进同理。就像这样。然后把水桶翻个个轻拍一下。

yingyinNormal.en: First, we fill the buckets with snow. We turn the buckets upside down. Give them a little tap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我们给桶里装满雪。我们再把桶像这样倒过来。然后轻轻拍一拍。

yingyinNormal.en: This is really good water. It's very refreshing. Spring water, is it? I don't know, sir. I think it's tap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这水真的不错。非常提神。矿泉水吗？我不知道，先生。应该是自来水。

yingyinNormal.en: You two, switch. I gotta put out more napkins. That women's breakup support group is here, and they tap us out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两个，换位置吧 我得拿多点纸巾出来，那个女性失恋互助小组快用光纸巾了。

yingyinNormal.en: If they use God's Eye, it will tap the cameras around to find our location, which means we could plant a virus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们启用天眼，它就会利用镜头找到我们的位置，这样我们就可以植入病毒。

yingyinNormal.en: Dude, let's drive home. We'll hit all the maple candy stores on the way back and if they're closed, then maybe we'll tap a tree and make some ourselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们开车回家吧，可以在回家路上再去每间枫糖糖果店，而且如果他们关门了，或许我们可以找棵树自己做枫糖。

yingyinNormal.en: You're right, I can't. You know what? Anyone could rent that apartment now. An opera singer, the cast of stomp. Yeah, a tap-dancing pirate with a wooden leg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我不知道，告诉你任何人都可能租那个房，歌剧歌手啦，跺脚舞演员啦，有条木腿的踢踏舞海盗啦。

yingyinNormal.en: And in my address to the UN, I challenged the world, especially Muslim communities to reject the ideology of violent extremism and to do more to tap the extraordinary potential of their young people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我在联合国讲话时，我向世界提出挑战，特别是穆斯林国家，拒绝暴力极端主义的意识形态并做更多的事情来挖掘他们国家年轻人的潜力。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 利用; 开发; 发掘
放出液体; 水龙头; 阀门
窃取(金钱/信息); 装窃听器

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 抽头的；分接的；发接触音的

word_family.mean: n. 龙头；阀门；螺丝攻；酒吧；轻敲；轻轻敲击声；踢踏舞；熄灯号；窃听

sense_info_list.en: exploit or draw a supply from a resource
sense_info_list.zh: 利用; 开发; 发掘

examination_example.sentence: In one study, participants completed a battery of eight tasks, including four that <highlight>tapped</highlight> reflective thinking and four that <highlight>tapped</highlight> intuition and creativity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项研究中，参与者完成了一组八项任务，其中四项利用了反思思维，四项利用了直觉和创造力。

sense_info_list.en: draw liquid from a cask, barrel, or other container
sense_info_list.zh: 放出液体; 水龙头; 阀门

examination_example.sentence: Television is a one-way <highlight>tap</highlight> flowing into our homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视是流入我们家庭的单向水龙头。

sense_info_list.en: strike someone or something with a quick light blow or blows
obtain money or information from someone
sense_info_list.zh: 窃取(金钱/信息); 装窃听器

examination_example.sentence: Draper suggests selecting sentimental items of clothing, as clothes with fond associations can help you <highlight>tap</highlight> into constructive emotions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Draper建议选择感性的衣服，因为带有美好联想的衣服可以帮助你挖掘建设性的情绪。

examination_example.sentence: Introducing a fund raising requirement for students does not help, as better off children can <highlight>tap</highlight> up richer aunts and neighbour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对学生提出筹集资金并没有什么帮助，因为条件更好的孩子可以与较富裕的阿姨和邻居见面。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have tried to <highlight>tap</highlight> Internet donors, too, with mixed success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们也曾尝试利用互联网捐助者，但结果喜忧参半。

sense_info_list.en: strike someone or something with a quick light blow or blows

examination_example.sentence: I believe we have less connection with the value of our money when we just <highlight>tap</highlight> the "Approve" buttons on our phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我相信，当我们只需点击手机上的“批准”按钮时，我们与金钱的价值就没有那么紧密的关联了。

sense_info_list.en: obtain money or information from someone
draw liquid from a cask; barrel; or other container

examination_example.sentence: When travelling overseas, do you buy water in plastic bottles or take your chances with <highlight>tap</highlight> water?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你出国旅行时，你是会选择买瓶水还是尝试喝自来水？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: exploit or draw a supply from a resource

examination_example.sentence: The likables' plays-well-with-others qualities strengthen schoolyard friendships, jump-start interpersonal skills and, when <highlight>tapped</highlight> early, are employed ever after in life and work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 讨人喜欢的人非常合群，这种特质能深化校园友谊，迅速提升人际交往技巧，而且这种特质如果开发得早，会在我们日后的生活和工作中终身受用。

sense_info_list.en: strike someone or something with a quick light blow or blows

examination_example.sentence: A lunchtime escape allows her to keep a boss from <highlight>tapping</highlight> her on the shoulder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 午餐时间的脱身让她避免了被老板拍肩膀。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 利用; 开发; 发掘

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: You can use a disinfectant (消毒的) cleaner to clean doorknobs, <highlight>taps</highlight>, toilet handles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以用消毒剂清洁门把手、水龙头、马桶把手。

examination_example.sentence: She was brushing her teeth and the <highlight>tap</highlight> (水龙头) was on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她正在刷牙，水龙头开着。

examination_example.sentence: If it feels there are hands, the water with the air will come from the <highlight>tap</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果感觉有手，水和空气就会从水龙头出来。

sense_info_list.en: strike someone or something with a quick light blow or blows

examination_example.sentence: You should not <highlight>tap</highlight> chopsticks on the edge of the bowl either, as beggars do this to ask for food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你也不应该在碗的边缘用筷子敲打，因为乞丐这样做是为了要食物。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>tapped</highlight> (敲打) something gently. The engine started back up at once.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他轻轻地拍了一下什么东西。发动机立即重新启动。

examination_example.sentence: The man sent a bill that read: <highlight>Tapping</highlight> with a hammer—$2
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个人送来一张账单，上面写着：用锤子敲——2美元

sense_info_list.en: exploit or draw a supply from a resource
sense_info_list.zh: 利用; 开发; 发掘
